lastRacesDescription:
led group, switched to near side soon after start, lost position 3f out, towards rear when groups merged 2f out, weakened inside final 110yds, 3rd of 4 in group (trainer's rep had no explanation for the poor form shown)
prominent, lost ground inside final furlong, keeping on when edged left and bit short of room inside final 110yds
in touch with leaders, went second inside final furlong, no match for winner
prominent, ridden over 1f out, soon led narrowly, kept on well, always doing enough
in touch with leaders, outpaced over 2f out, hung left over 1f out, went third post, kept on
in touch with leaders, headway over 1f out, weakened inside final furlong
took keen hold, in touch with leaders, headway under 2f out, edged left 1f out, soon went second, kept on
took keen hold, disputed lead, weakened inside final furlong (jockey said gelding ran too free)
in touch with leaders on far side of group, ridden and challenging inside final furlong, kept on, just held
switched right soon after start, in rear, outpaced halfway, headway over 1f out, kept on well and went second final 110yds, pressed leader towards finish, just failed
towards rear, headway final furlong, kept on, never dangerous
midfield up the centre, carried left 2f out, headway and went fourth inside final furlong, kept on
in touch with leaders, shaken up 2f out, switched left and ridden over 1f out, ran on well and went third final strides
blindfold off late, slowly into stride, raced in last, outpaced and pushed along after 1f, headway up the centre over 1f out, soon ridden, went third final 110yds, nearest finish
withdrawn - broke out of stalls
prominent in centre of group, pushed along halfway, weakened over 1f out
raced near side, held up in behind leaders, pushed along over 2f out, ridden and some headway over 1f out, no impression inside final furlong
slightly hampered soon after start, always towards rear (jockey said gelding missed the break and was slowly away; vet said post-race examination revealed he had an irregular heartbeat)
edged right and bumped rival soon after start, led, pushed along against near rail over 2f out, ridden and headed over 1f out, weakened gradually inside final furlong
raced near side, raced in second, ridden 2f out, lost position inside final furlong, no extra final 110yds, 6th of 14 in group
in rear, hampered and lost ground soon after start, pushed along before halfway, still plenty to do when switched right over 2f out, carried right over 1f out, went second final 110yds, kept on, did well in the circumstances
prominent, niggled along over 2f out, ridden and good headway over 1f out, led final 110yds, always doing enough
close up, joined leader over 2f out, pushed along and edged left but led over 1f out, ridden inside final 110yds, kept on, readily
chased leader, niggled along when slightly hampered under 3f out, pushed along and close up under 2f out, soon went third, kept on and went second inside final furlong, edged left inside final 110yds, no match for winner

prominent, briefly went second inside final furlong, lost third inside final 110yds
pressed leaders, no extra final 110yds
pressed leader on far side of group, kept on inside final furlong
in touch with leaders, bit short of room when headway against rail over 1f out, no extra towards finish
prominent towards far side, weakened quickly over 1f out, 5th of 6 in group
prominent, weakened inside final furlong
raced far side, in touch with leaders, no extra inside final furlong, 8th of 11 in group
prominent, pressed leaders against near rail 2f out, outpaced inside final furlong, kept on towards finish, lost third final stride
led narrowly, headed 2f out, weakened over 1f out
prominent, lost ground but in touch with leaders after 1f, going okay when headway from 2f out, ridden to lead inside final furlong, kept on well
prominent, outpaced and edged left inside final furlong
led, headed and prominent after 1f, weakened inside final furlong
started quickly, raced in second, led over 1f out, kept on but headed towards finish, just failed
raced in second, lost position 1f out, weakened final 110yds
prominent, weakened from over 1f out
prominent, no extra final furlong
pressed leader, weakened inside final furlong
prominent, weakened over 1f out
raced far side, led overall, headed final 110yds, soon no extra and lost three places, 3rd of 11 in group
in touch with leaders, weakened over 1f out
raced far side, led, headed over 1f out, kept on final 110yds
made all, ridden 1f out, soon edged left, kept on well final 110yds
made all, raced centre, pushed along over 2f out, kept on well from over 1f out, reduced lead towards finish, just held on
pressed leader, weakened from over 1f out
took keen hold, led, edged left soon after start, headed and prominent from over 3f out, switched right and challenging when jockey dropped whip over 1f out, soon weakened gradually
in touch with leaders against near rail, outpaced and pushed along halfway, ridden and weakened from over 1f out, eased final 110yds
pressed leader, ridden over 1f out, soon weakened
led, headed but raced in second over 4f out, ridden and lost second over 1f out, weakened inside final furlong
prominent, raced in second 4f out, pushed along 2f out, ridden and lost second 1f out, lost third towards finish
raced far side, disputed lead, pushed along 2f out, ridden over 1f out, weakened final furlong, 7th of 7 in group
raced far side, prominent, ridden over 1f out, no extra final furlong, 2nd of 7 in group
prominent towards near side, pushed along 2f out, lost position 1f out, kept on
led group up the centre, pushed along over 2f out, soon ridden and weakened
unsuitable ground
raced centre, prominent, ridden 2f out, no impression when bumped under 2f out, weakened from over 1f out
in touch with leaders, lost position and dropped to rear when ridden over 2f out, well held inside final furlong
led, ridden halfway, headed over 1f out, soon weakened
pressed leader, pushed along over 1f out, ridden and led inside final furlong, soon clear and ran on well, comfortably
chased leaders on inner, pushed along 2f out, ridden and no extra final furlong
in touch with leaders, pushed along 2f out, ridden over 1f out, weakened final furlong
prominent, ridden 2f out, weakened inside final furlong
in touch with leaders, pushed along and chased leader 2f out, weakened inside final furlong
prominent in centre of group, went second over 2f out, ridden when carried right over 1f out, rallied and disputed lead inside final furlong, kept on well final 110yds, forced dead-heat
close up, pushed along 2f out, ridden and beaten over 1f out, weakened inside final furlong
disputed lead, led halfway, 1 length ahead and ridden over 1f out, drifted left and faced strong challenge inside final furlong, headed final strides (jockey said gelding hung left)
close up, led 3f out, ridden and headed over 1f out, soon weakened
pressed leader, pushed along 2f out, led over 1f out, 1 length ahead and ridden inside final furlong, kept on final 110yds, headed final strides
prominent on far side of group, led going easily over 2f out, ridden over 1f out, reduced lead inside final 110yds, kept on well
chased leader, pushed along 2f out, ridden to lead 1f out, headed inside final furlong, kept on
close up, chased leader over 3f out, shaken up and lost second over 1f out, weakened inside final furlong (trainer's representative could offer no explanation for gelding's performance)
prominent, pushed along halfway, ridden and hung left inside final furlong, no extra towards finish (jockey said gelding hung left under pressure)
raced near side, close up, ridden and hung badly left over 1f out, no extra final 110yds
prominent, nudged along and led 2f out, ridden and headed inside final furlong, weakened towards finish
close up on far side of group, led over 2f out, ridden and joined over 1f out, led clearly inside final furlong, edged left and kept on strongly final 110yds
close up, pushed along 2f out, ridden to challenge inside final furlong, no extra final 110yds, lost second towards finish
chased leaders, ridden 2f out, no extra inside final furlong, weakened final 110yds
raced far side and alone, chased leaders, pushed along halfway, soon weakened
prominent, close up 2f out, pushed along over 1f out, ridden and weakened final furlong
raced far side and alone, led, ridden over 1f out, headed and no extra final 110yds
chased leaders towards near side, pushed along 2f out, ridden over 1f out, weakened inside final furlong
raced centre, in rear, ridden when groups merged over 2f out, never dangerous
prominent in centre of group, ridden 2f out, no extra final 110yds
tracked leaders on near side of group, ridden over 2f out, weakened gradually inside final 110yds
chased leaders, pushed along over 2f out, ridden over 1f out, weakened inside final furlong (jockey said gelding lost its right-fore shoe)
close up on outer, ridden and led over 1f out, edged left and against near rail final furlong, kept on but just caught
pressed leader, led and ridden over 1f out, edged left and headed inside final furlong, soon no chance with ready winner
led, shaken up and headed over 1f out, stayed on same pace inside final furlong
chased leaders centre, ridden along over 2f out, soon weakened
close up, disputed lead 2f out, soon ridden, driven entering final furlong, weakened
chased leaders, ridden along 2f out, soon driven and kept on one pace
chased leaders, ridden entering final 2f, soon struggling and outpaced over 1f out, weakened inside final furlong
close up, ridden to dispute lead over 1f out, led narrowly entering final furlong, driven out
close up in centre of group, led over 1f out to inside final furlong, kept on, held towards finish
looked well; chased leaders, slightly impeded after 1f and lost place, towards rear halfway, effort over 1f out, headway but still plenty to do when not clear run and eased inside final furlong (jockey said gelding was denied a clear run and became unbalanced on the road crossings)
close up centre, led 2f out, ridden over 1f out, driven and headed inside final furlong, kept on
close up centre, led 2f out, soon ridden, kept on strongly
led, ridden over 1f out, headed inside final 150yds, stayed on same pace near finish
behind and soon pushed along in centre of group, headway and looking for room over 1f out, kept on final furlong, nearest finish
tracked leaders, switched left over 1f out, ridden, edged left and ran on to lead well inside final furlong
chased leaders towards far rail, ridden along over 1f out, kept on final furlong
chased leaders, ridden 2f out, kept on
close up, led well over 1f out, ridden entering final furlong, edged left, kept on strongly (trainer could offer no explanation for the gelding's improved form)
chased leaders towards near side, ridden 2f out, lost place when short of room entering final furlong, soon weakened
led, joined 2f out and soon ridden, driven and headed entering final furlong, soon weakened
raced on outer in midfield, ridden and weakened over 1f out
close up, centre, ridden along 2f out, driven over 1f out, gradually weakened
raced in centre, chased leaders, effort and close enough over 1f out, unable to quicken and weakened inside final furlong
with leader near side to 2f out, one pace over 1f out, 3rd of 10 in group
made all, raced in centre of group, ridden over 1f out, edged left inside final furlong, kept on strongly, unchallenged
with leaders, ridden and every chance over 1f out, no extra inside final furlong
chased leaders far side, ridden along 2f out, gradually weakened
chased leaders, chance well over 1f out, soon unable to quicken, faded final 100yds
raced far side, led, ridden along and headed over 1f out, weakened final furlong (jockey said the gelding hung left from 2f out)
led, ridden over 1f out, headed and no extra just inside final furlong
chased leaders, ridden well over 1f out, soon driven and weakened (vet reported the gelding bled from the nose)
pressed leading pair on outer, ridden to lead briefly well over 1f out, outpaced by winner soon after, lost 2nd last 75yds
raced towards far side, made all, ridden clear over 1f out, driven out
made all, ridden clear entering final furlong, ran on well, eased towards finish
tracked leader, ridden 2f out, kept on but always held
midfield, ridden over 1f out, no response and soon beaten, weakened and well behind when eased well inside final furlong (jockey said colt ran too freely and stopped quickly)
raced far side, well in touch in midfield, ridden 2f out, soon beaten, behind final furlong, 12th of 12 in group
swerved left start, took keen hold, held up in last pair, shaken up 2f out, raced awkwardly and weakened over 1f out (jockey said colt hung left throughout)
tracked leaders, led over 1f out, soon hung left, ran on well final furlong and always in command
not that well away, took keen hold and soon tracked leading pair, switched to outer 2f out, ridden to lead just inside final furlong, hung left after, headed last strides
in touch in leading quintet, closed over 2f out, effort over 1f out, every chance and ridden 1f out, unable to quicken inside final furlong, kept on same pace final 100yds

in touch with leaders, not clear run when headway over 1f out, went third final strides, kept on
held up in rear, not clear run repeatedly over 1f out, headway inside final 110yds, never on terms (jockey said mare was denied a clear run approaching 1f out)
slowly away, in rear, outpaced 2f out, no impression
midfield towards far side, hampered over 1f out, never dangerous, 12th of 16 in group
prominent, outpaced and ridden over 1f out, hung right inside final furlong, kept on well inside final 110yds, led final strides
held up in midfield, headway on outer over 1f out, ridden and challenging final 110yds, kept on
in rear, outpaced after 1f, not clear run over 1f out, good headway inside final furlong, ridden to lead post, ran on well
midfield, switched left and headway over 2f out, hung left over 1f out, soon pressed leaders, went second inside final furlong, kept on final 110yds
towards rear but in touch with leaders, going okay and on far side of group when headway from 2f out, led 1f out, ridden and kept on well inside final furlong, comfortably
prominent behind clear leader, went second 2f out, pressed leader 1f out, ridden to lead inside final furlong, ran on well final 110yds, won going away
in touch with leaders, smooth headway halfway, led 2f out, soon hung badly left, ridden and ran on well inside final furlong, always doing enough
dwelt start, towards rear, headway on outer over 1f out, kept on final 110yds
steadied start, always behind
in rear, edged left and outpaced 2f out, never on terms
hung left throughout, held up in last, outpaced and lost touch over 5f out, tailed off
slowly away and ducked right start, ran green early, soon outpaced and detached, struggling before halfway, soon no chance

made all, ridden 1f out, faced challenges final 110yds, kept on
towards rear, some headway over 1f out, kept on but not pace to challenge
in touch with leaders, headway over 3f out, led over 1f out, soon edged right and ridden, kept on
midfield, some headway over 1f out, switched left and ran on inside final furlong, nearest finish
towards rear, headway when not clear run final 110yds, not recover (jockey said gelding was denied a clear run approximately 110yds out)
ducked left start, in rear, switched left and headway from over 1f out, led 1f out, kept on inside final furlong
took keen hold, in touch with leaders, switched right over 1f out, headway and went third inside final 110yds, kept on
in touch with leaders, weakened from over 1f out
in touch with leaders, short of room and hampered after 2f, prominent over 1f out, weakened inside final furlong
took keen hold, in touch with leaders, headway over 1f out, kept on final 110yds
bumped start, took keen hold, towards rear, ducked right and bumped rival under 4f out, switched right 1f out, edged left but ran on well inside final furlong, went second towards finish
took keen hold, towards rear, not clear run and weakened inside final furlong
midfield, headway and edged left inside final furlong, not reach leaders
midfield, headway and pressed leaders halfway, weakened quickly inside final furlong
self certificate
pressed leader, weakened final 110yds
carried left start, took keen hold, in rear, headway from over 1f out, went second final 110yds, kept on
took keen hold, in touch with leaders, going okay when headway 2f out, weakened gradually inside final furlong
raced wide, midfield, headway over 1f out, weakened inside final furlong, did well in the circumstances
took keen hold, in touch with leaders, weakened inside final furlong
anticipated start, prominent, unbalanced and hung left inside final furlong, no impression towards finish
took keen hold, prominent against far rail, weakening when short of room inside final furlong
took keen hold, prominent, ridden and weakened inside final 110yds
took keen hold, towards rear, headway from over 1f out, ran on inside final furlong, not reach leaders (jockey said gelding was briefly denied a clear run inside final furlong)
in touch with leaders, switched right over 1f out, switched left and kept on but no impression inside final furlong, weakened towards finish
raced in second, challenging 2f out, led 1f out, soon headed and no extra, just held second
took keen hold, held up in midfield, not clear run over 1f out, no impression inside final furlong
upset in stalls, towards rear, headway over 2f out, weakened inside final furlong (jockey said gelding was fractious in the stalls)
midfield, repeatedly short of room from over 1f out (jockey said gelding was denied a clear run on several occasions from 2f out)
took keen hold, prominent, bumped after 1f, went second 1f out, challenging inside final furlong, led inside final 110yds, kept on and just did enough
towards rear on far side of group, kept on inside final furlong, never on terms
unsuitable ground

slowly into stride, pushed along soon after start, towards rear, outpaced and pushed along after 2f, ridden and keeping on over 1f out, went second 1f out, lost second inside final furlong, no extra final 110yds

in touch with leaders, not clear run and ridden over 1f out, outpaced final furlong
midfield, pushed along 2f out, kept on final furlong, never dangerous
prominent, shaken up early, going okay when not clear run from under 2f out, soon waiting for room, switched left and in the clear over 1f out, ridden and no extra inside final furlong
carried right start, soon led, went clear over 2f out, much reduced lead over 1f out, ridden and headed inside final furlong, no extra inside final 110yds (jockey said gelding ran too free)
ducked left start, took keen hold, prominent, pushed along and every chance over 1f out, soon lost second and ridden, weakened inside final furlong, finished 6th, placed 5th
midfield, pushed along and waiting for room 2f out, ridden and in the clear over 1f out, weakened final furlong
held up in rear, switched left and ridden over 1f out, headway final 110yds, kept on, nearest finish
took keen hold, in touch with leaders against near rail, waiting for room 2f out, switched left and ridden over 1f out, held but disputing fourth final 110yds, soon no extra
prominent on inner, pushed along over 2f out, ridden and led narrowly over 1f out, soon edged right, edged left and headed inside final furlong, weakened inside final 110yds
self certificate

prominent towards near side, ridden 2f out, weakened from over 1f out
close up, pushed along from 2f out, weakened inside final furlong
travelled strongly, chased leaders, went second over 4f out, joined leader and going easily 2f out, led over 1f out, pushed along and quickened 1f out, went clear inside final furlong, comfortably
slowly away, raced centre, in rear, pushed along and outpaced over 2f out, ridden and headway over 1f out, kept on, nearest finish (jockey said gelding was restless in the stalls)
slowly into stride, in rear, shaken up over 1f out, ran on inside final furlong, not reach leaders
always towards rear, pushed along 2f out, made no impression
raced near side, towards rear of midfield, smooth headway and chased leaders 2f out, ridden over 1f out, no impression and held final 110yds
soon in rear, pushed along and some headway from over 2f out, stumbled over path inside final furlong, no extra when ridden inside final 110yds
awkward start, in touch with leaders, ridden over 2f out, outpaced over 1f out, beaten inside final furlong
took keen hold, close up on outer, ridden over 1f out, lost ground inside final furlong, held final 110yds (trainer's rep said, regarding poor performance, that the gelding was unsuited by running without cover in the early stages)
held up in behind leaders, switched left and quickened to lead 1f out, pushed along and went clear inside final furlong, comfortably
chased leader, pushed along and every chance over 1f out, led inside final furlong, reminders and ran on well inside final 110yds, won going away
slight lead, pushed along 2f out, ridden over 1f out, carried head high inside final furlong, just prevailed
midfield, ridden over 1f out, ran on inside final furlong, went second final 110yds, nearest finish
took keen hold, midfield on outer, raced wide but headway on turn and tracked leaders after 2f, ridden and every chance 2f out, briefly led 1f out, no extra and lost second final 110yds
held up in rear, headway from 2f out, soon ridden, kept on inside final furlong, not pace to challenge
in touch with leaders, headway and went second over 1f out, ridden and disputed lead final furlong, no extra towards finish
dwelt start, in rear, short of room over 4f out, outpaced and ridden when hung right over 2f out, soon beaten
dwelt start, tracked winner, going okay when not clear run 2f out, ridden over 1f out, kept on but always held

in rear, headway over 2f out, weakened over 1f out
raced wide early, pressed leader, led after 1f, headed over 1f out, weakened inside final furlong
slowly into stride, towards rear, switched left over 1f out, carried head awkwardly and kept on inside final furlong, never dangerous
pulled hard, in rear towards far side, hung badly left over 1f out, never on terms, 14th of 16 in group
slowly into stride, in rear, short of room against rail inside final furlong, never on terms
dwelt start, pulled hard, in rear but in touch with leaders, headway when on near side of group over 3f out, weakened from over 1f out
took keen hold, in touch with leaders in centre of group, going easily 2f out, not clear run repeatedly from over 1f out, kept on when in the clear final 110yds, did well in the circumstances
dwelt start, raced in fourth, headway over 1f out, raced awkwardly and weakened inside final furlong (jockey said gelding was slowly away)
slowly away, raced awkwardly throughout, raced in last, ran on when cajoled along and switched right inside final furlong, nearest finish (jockey said gelding was slowly away and denied a clear run inside final 110yds)
slowly away, took keen hold, hung badly left throughout, in touch with leaders on far side of group, weakened gradually inside final furlong, carried head high towards finish
took keen hold, in rear, going easily up the centre over 2f out, hung badly left but headway over 1f out, ridden and ran on inside final furlong, challenging final 110yds, soon hung left and no extra
slowly away, raced in last, switched left over 2f out, good headway but hung badly left over 1f out, ridden to lead inside final 110yds, ran on well
took keen hold, towards rear, steady headway when not clear run over 2f out, edged left and carried head high inside final furlong, soon no extra
slowly away, took keen hold, raced in last, hung left but headway towards near side 2f out, no extra and nudged out final 110yds (jockey said gelding was slow away)
slowly away, towards rear, switched right halfway, headway over 1f out, pressed leaders inside final furlong, kept on
slowly away, held up in last, still plenty to do 3f out, headway 2f out, soon switched right, kept on inside final furlong, went fourth towards finish, not pace to challenge
took keen hold, prominent in chasing group, switched to near side and chased clear leader over 2f out, weakened over 1f out
lost many lengths start, raced in last, still plenty to do when switched right 2f out, soon carried head awkwardly, never on terms (trainer could offer no explanation for the poor form shown)
slowly into stride, took keen hold, held up in midfield, pushed along and headway on inner 2f out, challenging over 1f out, ridden and led narrowly 1f out, headed final strides
slowly away, towards rear, pushed along over 2f out, ridden over 1f out, never on terms (jockey said gelding was slowly away)
slowly into stride, took keen hold, held up in rear, pushed along and headway over 1f out, ridden and edged left inside final furlong, disputing second inside final 110yds, kept on
slowly into stride, took keen hold, held up in last, pushed along and headway when raced awkwardly 2f out, keeping on when short of room against near rail over 1f out, soon switched left, ridden and kept on well inside final furlong, just held
slowly away, took keen hold, raced in last, pushed along briefly and headway from 3f out, cruising 2f out, pushed along again and pressed leader over 1f out, ridden to lead inside final 110yds, kept on
dwelt start and slightly awkward start, held up in last, cajoled along and still plenty to do from over 2f out, pushed along and headway from over 1f out, kept on but drifted left inside final furlong, not pace to challenge
slowly into stride, switched left soon after start, in rear, switched right 2f out, headway and hung left from 1f out, went fourth and kept on inside final furlong
slowly into stride, in rear, still plenty to do 2f out, nudged along and short of room over 1f out, switched right and in the clear inside final furlong, soon ridden, ran on and went third towards finish, nearest finish
slowly away, in rear, some headway over 2f out, pushed along and good headway but hung left from over 1f out, stayed on inside final furlong
slowly away, raced freely, held up in rear, pushed along and headway on far side of group from over 1f out, ridden and led narrowly final 110yds, kept on
unsuitable ground
slowly away, in rear, ridden and headway over 1f out, ran on, not reach leaders
ducked right start, raced freely, prominent on outer, going okay when led 2f out, soon shaken up, pushed along when headed over 1f out, soon ridden, weakened and lost position inside final furlong (jockey said gelding ran too free; vet said a post-race examination failed to reveal any abnormalities)
midfield on far side of group, pushed along before halfway, ridden and headway over 1f out, led 1f out, kept on (trainer said, regarding improvement in form, gelding benefited from better ground on this occasion, which was officially described as Good, Good to firm in places)
got loose beforehand, raced freely, midfield, pushed along halfway, ridden and no impression over 1f out
slowly away, in rear, pushed along over 2f out, soon ridden, made no impression (jockey said gelding was slowly away)
raced freely, in rear, niggled along over 2f out, nudged along when midfield under 2f out, prominent 1f out, pushed along final 110yds, nearest finish
slowly away, always towards rear, ridden over 2f out, soon well held (jockey said gelding ran too free)
close up, shaken up and led narrowly 2f out, ridden and wandered around over 1f out, headed by winner inside final furlong, weakened towards finish
in rear, pushed along 3f out, switched right and on outer over 1f out, kept on, never near to challenge (jockey said gelding was denied a clear run approaching 2f out)
slowly into stride, soon pushed along, outpaced in rear, detached after 2f, raced in last 2f out, stayed on from over 1f out, nearest finish

towards rear, headway over 1f out, went third inside final furlong, lost third inside final 110yds
prominent, waiting for room when switched left over 1f out, headway inside final furlong, kept on well inside final 110yds, just failed
dwelt and stumbled start, in rear, headway and in touch with leaders over 3f out, pushed along and led against near rail 1f out, ridden inside final furlong, kept on
lost many lengths start, in rear, joined main group after 1f, headway over 1f out, no extra inside final 110yds (jockey said gelding was slowly away)
switched right soon after start, towards rear, headway from 4f out, led final 110yds, cosily
vet's certificate
dwelt start, in rear, midfield going easily but waiting for room 2f out, switched left and headway from over 1f out, ridden to lead inside final 110yds, hung left and idled towards finish, just held on
awkward start, held up in rear, smooth headway then short of room 2f out, switched left and some headway from over 1f out, weakened final 110yds
slowly away, in rear, headway over 1f out, disputing third inside final furlong, soon no extra (jockey said gelding was slowly away)
awkward start, in rear, headway over 1f out, soon no impression
in rear, headway inside final furlong, did well in the circumstances
slowly away, always behind (jockey said gelding was slowly away)
slowly away, always behind
slowly away, always behind
awkward start, always behind

withdrawn; vet's certificate

slowly into stride, took keen hold, in rear throughout, eased towards finish

midfield, headway 2f out, bumped 1f out, went third inside final furlong, kept on final 110yds, finished 3rd, placed 2nd

mounted in chute, took keen hold, held up in rear, switched right 2f out, headway inside final furlong, ran on, not reach leaders
mounted on course, lost many lengths start, in rear, still plenty to do halfway, steady headway from 2f out, kept on inside final furlong, nearest finish
mounted in chute, awkward start and slowly into stride, in rear, some headway 2f out, kept on inside final furlong, nearest finish
